thread.title: Dolphins’ Darren Rizzi promoted to assistant head coach
thread.title_full: Dolphins’ Darren Rizzi promoted to assistant head coach

author: wtopstaff
title: Dolphins’ Darren Rizzi promoted to assistant head coach
text:
Home » News » Sports » NFL » Dolphins' Darren Rizzi promoted… Dolphins’ Darren Rizzi promoted to assistant head coach By The Associated Press October 12, 2015 11:20 am 
DAVIE, Fla. (AP) — Miami Dolphins special teams coordinator Darren Rizzi has been promoted to assistant head coach by interim head coach Dan Campbell. 
The change announced Monday is the latest on Campbell’s staff. He was promoted last week from tight ends coach when head coach Joe Philbin was fired after the Dolphins’ 1-3 start. 
Miami had a bye last week and plays Sunday at Tennessee. 
Rizzi will continue as special teams coordinator. He joined the Dolphins in 2009.
